text: Rabidosa is a genus of spiders described by Roewer (1960). The family is Lycosidae. It contains the following species: *Rabidosa carrana (Bryant, 1934) — USA *Rabidosa hentzi (Banks, 1904) — USA *Rabidosa punctulata (Hentz, 1844) — USA *Rabidosa rabida (Walckenaer, 1837) — North America *Rabidosa santrita (Chamberlin & Ivie, 1942) — USA ==References== Category:Lycosidae Category:Spiders of North America Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Taxa named by Carl Friedrich Roewer
title: Rabidosa
